apps.name: top-ten-commits
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Displays top 10 commits based on number of files changed as a bar chart.

apps.name: hot-files
apps.author: Ganesha Upadhyaya<ganeshau@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Shows top 10 hot files based on number of revisions.

apps.name: constant-enforcer
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Reports and visualizes number of Static fields which are not Final.

apps.name: wontfix-bug-detector
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Shows number of WontFix bugs in Project.

apps.name: null-checks
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Counts number of null checking fixing revisions.

apps.name: noi-over-issues
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Displays Number of Issues per Issue type in Projects.

apps.name: commit-police
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Checks and identifies developers writing empty or one word commit logs, e.g. fixed.

apps.name: impactful-commits
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Lists commits that involved a large number of files.

apps.name: flawed-logic
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Displays the number of instances of if-else logic, where depth is greater than 10.

apps.name: serialization-police
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Show the number of violations to serialization property.

apps.name: null-detector
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Checks the improper use of null.

apps.name: revision-watcher
apps.author: Ganesha Upadhyaya <ganeshau@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Provides details about a revision, which includes number of files modified, revision date etc

apps.name: developer-activity-checker
apps.author: Ganesha Upadhyaya <ganeshau@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Provides details about developer's last commit

apps.name: popularity-metrics
apps.author: Ganesha Upadhyaya <ganeshau@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Computes various metrics, such as CK Metrics (NOC WMC), OO Metrics (NOPM, FanOut, LOC) etc

apps.name: check-doubled-checked
apps.author: Ganesha Upadhyaya <ganeshau@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Checks and warns against the used of doubled-checked locking idiom

apps.name: wait-notify-police
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Checks and warns against improper usage of wait-notify features

apps.name: convention-checker
apps.author: Nitin Mukesh Tiwari <nmtiwari@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Checks naming conventions,e.g. class names should start with an uppercase letter

apps.name: top-performers
apps.author: Trey Erenberger <treye@iastate.edu>
apps.description: Displays the number of commits per username as a pie chart.
